entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Sport 2001/1. The attitude of the Hungarian adult population towards sports, visiting sports events.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E58: TÁRKI Sport 2001/1. The attitude of the Hungarian adult population towards sports, visiting sports events.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09

2. Sági, Matild
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Ministry of Youth and Sports (1.)

entry.dcterms:description: 1) relationship of respondent to sports, habits of watching sports programs and using internet in connection with sports; population customs of frequenting sports events and rooting; football-pools; sporting opportunities, sporting habits of the respondent; subjective evaluation of the health of the respondent, eating habits 2) "Survival chances of enterprises in Hungary" survey, finishing wave
entry.dcterms:subject: health condition
leisure, tourism and sport
demography
time use
society and culture
mass media
person
survey data
time-series

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
